name: Chaotic Chess
description:
Game still in development!

This is a monochromatic chess game, but with a twist to it, so we can achieve absolute CHAOS! You can put powers on your pieces and they will have different impact on the game, changing the way you think when playing this version of chess.

This game was made for the Black and White Jam by:

  • Summyt14 (programmer)
  • Rafifumi (art)

We are part of a college game dev group from Portugal - GameDev Técnico. You can find us at itch.io, facebook and twitter.
